content: I could go for something along the lines of the the Missouri plan, but WITHOUT the retention election. Talk about fumbling the ball on the 1-yard line. They went through great pains to take the political aspect out of the selection, then they throw the ball to the voters after a year. The general population is not qualified to make that determination. There may be little impact at the state level from this, but at the national level, I expect any type of retention election election would corrupt the SCOTUS more than the current process — there’s too much riding on it.
